name: Remooble 4 Pack Magnetic Microfiber Cleaning Cloth Dry Erasers for Whiteboards - Towel Hangs on Metal Edged White Boards, Glassboards, and Blackboards Washable - 10'' X 10''
short_description: EFFECTIVELY CLEANS – Our whiteboard cleaning cloths will lift and trap dry erase marker dust with ease, easily cleaning any whiteboard. Pair them with our whiteboard renew for tough jobs.

SCRATCH FREE – Whiteboards are incredibly easy to scratch, and when your board gets scratched it starts to stain. Our ultra-soft and highly absorbent microfiber cleaning cloths keep your whiteboard scratch free and looking brand new.
ABSORBENT & LINT FREE – Made of 80% polyester and 20% polyamide with a 300gsm weight, these high-quality non-abrasive cleaning rags will leave your board without lint, streaks, or scratches.

REUSABLE & LONG LASTING - These microfiber towels feature high quality stitching with reinforced edges, they are durable and made to last hundreds of washings. They are lightweight, super absorbent and dry quickly.
MULTI-USE – These microfiber cleaning cloths aren’t just great for cleaning your dry erase board, they are perfect for cleaning windows, kitchenware, cars or other delicate surfaces.
